alert.note: Alert for Clay; Quitman; Randolph (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:00PM EDT until October 12 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN HENRY...NORTHWESTERN CLAY...RANDOLPH AND SOUTHEASTERN QUITMAN COUNTIES... At 459 PM EDT/359 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Gaines, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Cuthbert, Shellman, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Walter F George Lake, Standleys Store, Watson Crossroads, Double Bridges, Crossroads, Ricks Place, Pecan, Randolph Co A/p, Thomas Mill Creek, Hatcher, Morris, Jones Crossing, Bethel, Benevolence and Springvale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
